Beijing, August 24 (reporter Zhang Huizhong) - Premier Li Keqiang attended the third Lancang Mekong Cooperation leaders' video conference in the Great Hall of the people on the morning of 24. Li Keqiang and Prime Minister Tong Lun of Laos jointly presided over the meeting. Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Sen, Burmese president Wen Min, Thai Prime Minister bayou and Vietnamese Prime Minister Nguyen Chun Fuk attended.
